pages.text: I had heard rumors of a second layer to the nether before, and I remember in a half-forgotten dream that it was shielded by a layer of impenetrable rock, hiding something of immense value once pierced through. Could that be true of this world? What treasures await me?

pages.title: Liquid Void
pages.text: While incorrect in my assumption that the realm was capped, there were indeed constructions up there - some harboring a strange substance that reminds me of the void...
